semantics.label: Mode
semantics.description: Mode of presenting the dialog cards

fields.label: Tekst
fields.description: Nøkkelord til første del av dialogen

fields.label: Svar
fields.description: Nøkkelord til neste del av dialogen

fields.label: Bilde
fields.description: Valgfritt bilde for kortet.(Kortet kan bruke kun bilde, kun tekst, eller begge)

fields.label: Tip for text
fields.description: Tip for the first part of the dialogue

fields.label: Tip for answer
fields.description: Tip for the second part of the dialogue

semantics.label: Oppgaveinnstillinger
semantics.description: Disse valga lar deg styre ulike funksjoner i oppgava.

fields.label: Slå av tilbakenavigering
fields.description: Dette valget betyr at man bare kan navigere fremover

fields.label: Skaler teksten til å få pplass i kortet
fields.description: Når man slår av denne vil kortets størrelse endre seg iforhold til mengde tekst

fields.label: Randomize cards
fields.description: Enable to randomize the order of cards on display.

fields.label: Allow quick progression
fields.description: If activated, learners can decide to indicate that they know a card without turning it

semantics.label: Text for "Round" message below cards and on the summary screen
semantics.description: @round will be replaced by the number of the current round

semantics.label: Text for "Cards left" message
semantics.description: @number will be replaced by the number of cards left in this round

semantics.label: Text for the "next round" button
semantics.description: @round will be replaced by the round number

semantics.label: Title text for the summary page
Message when all cards have been learned proficiently
semantics.description: @cards will be replaced by the number of all cards in the pool. @max will be replaced by the maximum proficiency level.
semantics.default: Well done! You have mastered all @cards cards by getting them correct @max times!

semantics.label: Label for card text
semantics.description: Used for accessibility by assistive technologies

semantics.label: Label for card back
semantics.description: Used for accessibility by assistive technologies

semantics.label: Label for the show tip button
Audio not supported message
semantics.default: Your browser does not support this audio

fields.label: Body text
fields.default: All progress will be lost. Are you sure you want to start over?
